attributes.action: Stop all MPs from having a pay rise when the rest of the country won't get one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The MPs have voted for a 2.3% pay increase from April.  This is very unfair, particularly in light of the economic crisis.

The people of Britain need to see Parliament acting in due fairness.  Who else can vote themselves a pay rise?  Not many can.

During these troubled times Parliament and the Government need to be seen to be leading the way and NOT giving themselves pay rises.  When the economy looks better then vote, until then live with what you get now.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
